entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 56
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 4 Photos from the special event 1988-0304 Holī Celebrations, Pune, Maharashtra, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 medium resolutions and 2 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 7 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1988.
The event has also 5 photos Moments of Joy, link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
